pkgmetadata.longdescription: Customer accounting system, services and statistics collection management. The system is designed for small and medium-sized service providers with the number of subscribers to 5000. The licensed system without limiting the number of customers can support more users. In the overall assessment of performance of the system is able to maintain more than 20000 customers and at certain hardware requirements.
